entry.title: Prince Harry records special 'Thomas & Friends' episode

media:group.media:title: Prince Harry records special 'Thomas & Friends' episode
media:group.media:description:
He may have stepped down from official royal duties to start a new life in Los Angeles, but Prince Harry has not forgotten his British roots. The Duke of Sussex will introduce a special edition of an animated children's program about "Thomas the Tank Engine," which celebrates its 75th anniversary this year. The program airs in the US on Netflix on Friday and the following day in the UK on Channel 5 Milkshake! It will be available in more than 180 countries this year.
#Royals #CNN #News

entry.title: Houston mayor warns citizens to be 'very, very cautious' as retail reopens amid Covid-19 pandemic

media:group.media:title: Houston mayor warns citizens to be 'very, very cautious' as retail reopens amid Covid-19 pandemic
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Erin Burnett talks with Houston Mayor Sylvester Turner about Texas Governor Greg Abbott's decision to reopen some retail businesses this week.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Why Trump’s coronavirus advice is so dangerous

media:group.media:title: Why Trump’s coronavirus advice is so dangerous
media:group.media:description:
President Trump has often said he’s knowledgeable about science and medicine, but he is not a doctor, which is why many were alarmed when he said in a coronavirus press conference people should inject disinfectants into their bodies to fight the virus. Chris Cillizza explains.
SOURCES AND FURTHER READING: Donald Trump's incredibly dangerous musings on disinfectants https://www.cnn.com/2020/04/24/politics/donald-trump-disinfectant-uv-light/index.html
Read the transcript of AP’s interview with President Trump https://apnews.com/a28cc17d27524050b37f4d91e087955e
April 25 coronavirus news https://www.cnn.com/world/live-news/coronavirus-pandemic-04-25-20-intl/h_5d64d2e8318d95f6897f12b9a69edef0
The EPA is reminding people to use disinfectant only on surfaces https://www.nbcnews.com/politics/politics-news/epa-reminding-people-use-disinfectant-only-surfaces-n1191656
Lysol maker refutes Trump's suggestion that disinfectants may treat coronavirus https://www.axios.com/lysol-maker-disinfectants-coronavirus-donald-trump-3ff8ef52-6cc2-40e3-9c26-cc953e48cbf7.html
Maryland has received 'hundreds of calls' about the effectiveness of ingesting disinfectants to treat coronavirus, governor says https://www.cnn.com/2020/04/26/politics/maryland-disinfectants-coronavirus-larry-hogan-donald-trump/index.html
About me: I was named "best dressed" in 7th grade. That, along with being CNN's editor at large and author of the daily "Point" newsletter are my proudest achievements. Look for me here every Tuesday and Thursday to find out what’s really going down in politics.
CREDITS Writer: Chris Cillizza The Point team: Leigh Munsil and Allison Gordon Editor: Steven Sevilla Producer: Arielle Sacks
Follow Chris on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cillizzac/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/cillizzacnn Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/chris.cillizza/ Subscribe to The Point newsletter: https://mailchi.mp/cnn/dvgb325pfm
#CNN #Cillizza #Disinfectants

entry.title: Atlanta mayor: No mayor wants to be at odds with the governor

media:group.media:title: Atlanta mayor: No mayor wants to be at odds with the governor
media:group.media:description:
Atlanta Mayor Keisha Lance Bottoms tells CNN's Chris Cuomo about her frustrations around the state of Georgia starting to re-open during the coronavirus pandemic.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Neighbors discover they are long-lost cousins during pandemic

media:group.media:title: Neighbors discover they are long-lost cousins during pandemic
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Alisyn Camerota speaks with a pair of couples who are neighbors living on the same street in California that just figured out they are actually long-lost cousins with roots in Norway.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Sanjay Gupta: As we lift stay-at-home orders around US, the numbers will go up

media:group.media:title: Sanjay Gupta: As we lift stay-at-home orders around US, the numbers will go up
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Dr. Sanjay Gupta talks to CNN's Alisyn Camerota about how a new key model projects a higher death toll from coronavirus in the US as states begin to re-open across the country.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Scientists trial female sex hormone for Covid-19 patients

media:group.media:title: Scientists trial female sex hormone for Covid-19 patients
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Robyn Curnow interviews two scientists behind a study testing whether symptoms in male Covid-19 patients, who seem to be at a higher risk from the virus, can be reduced by treating them with estrogen.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Lemon: Trump couldn't resist the spotlight for more than a few days

media:group.media:title: Lemon: Trump couldn't resist the spotlight for more than a few days
media:group.media:description: CNN's Don Lemon discusses the latest coronavirus task force briefing held by President Donald Trump, in which the administration offered a blueprint for where they believe the boundaries between federal and state responsibilities for Covid-19 testing are. #CNN #News

entry.title: Residents rise up to end gang violence in Detroit

media:group.media:title: Residents rise up to end gang violence in Detroit
media:group.media:description:
Detroit's Red Zone is one of the most dangerous areas in America. Gun violence has been entrenched in its streets, but some residence are rising up to fight for change.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Astronaut describes seeing sunrise from Space for first time

media:group.media:title: Astronaut describes seeing sunrise from Space for first time
media:group.media:description:
Astronaut Anne McClain speaks to us from the International Space Station about the life-altering "Overview Effect" - seeing the earth from above - and what she hopes to bring back to earth from her research work in space.
#Space #CNN #News

entry.title: Experts re-envision the future of spacesuits

media:group.media:title: Experts re-envision the future of spacesuits
media:group.media:description:
What astronauts wear in space is a matter of life or death. As we plan on going to the moon and beyond, these experts are re-envisioning the future of the spacesuit.
#Space #CNN #News

entry.title: Dale: Most important misleading claim today came from Pence

media:group.media:title: Dale: Most important misleading claim today came from Pence
media:group.media:description: CNN's Daniel Dale fact-checks Vice President Mike Pence's response about coronavirus tests during a White House task force briefing. #CNN #News

entry.title: Trump refuses to take responsibility for spike in calls to poison control

media:group.media:title: Trump refuses to take responsibility for spike in calls to poison control
media:group.media:description: President Donald Trump says that he takes no responsibility for a spike in people using disinfectants improperly after dangerously suggesting last week that ingesting it could serve as a coronavirus treatment. #CNN #News

entry.title: Bill Gates gives best-case scenario for US economy

media:group.media:title: Bill Gates gives best-case scenario for US economy
media:group.media:description: Microsoft founder Bill Gates gives his take on the right measures the US needs to implement in order to reopen schools and his "best case" for the US economy. #CNN #News

entry.title: Why reporters don't walk out when Trump insults them

media:group.media:title: Why reporters don't walk out when Trump insults them
media:group.media:description:
Brian Stelter asks: Why don't they just walk out when they're insulted? ABC White House correspondent Jonathan Karl, author of "Front Row at The Trump Show, says he gets asked that question often. "As reporters, our job is to be there," he says. "The insults don't matter. Who cares?" He says "we are there to try to get the facts and to put the questions to those who are in power in this country."
#CNN #News #Trump
